page.title: 11HOUSING IN HOLBEACH DROVE
page.content:
HOUSING IS MAINLY OWNED PROPERTY BUT THERE ARE COUNCIL HOUSES AND OLD PEOPLES BUNGALOWS IN THE AREA. SOME FARMERS HAVE TIED COTTAGES AVAILABLE FOR THEIR EMPLOYEES. THIS MEANS THEY WILL LIVE IN THE PROPERTY OWNED BY THE FARMER FOR NO PAYMENT AS LONG AS THEY ARE EMPLOYED THERE.
PROPERTY IN THE AREA IS LESS EXPENSIVE AND THEREFORE MOST HOUSES HAVE QUITE ALOT OF LAND. THIS OBVIOUSLY MAKES THEM MORE ATTRACTIVE TO PEOPLE FROM THE NEARBY CITY OF PETERBOROUGH WHERE LAND IS MORE EXPENSIVE.
